name: LotteryChecker
0:
”Alexa, ask Lottery checker for Powerball”
”Alexa, ask Lottery checker for next Powerball”
”Alexa, ask Lottery checker for Powerball information”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: lottery checker
des:
The Lottery checker gives you the latest results of hundreds of local, state and national US lotteries like: 
Powerball, MegaMillions, Lucky For Life, Classic Lotto and many more (currently supporting about 300 lotteries).
You can also ask for the date and time of the next drawing, and some general information about the lottery.
Results are updated on an hourly basis.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
